name: APAC INTEGRATED PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
PABLE Fashion

Rewanta is a for profit organisation that has chosen to participate in a movement where the weaving community and artisans in the hinterlands of India get involved in the mainstream of development. 

Whether through promoting artisan handcraft or creating self-sustaining tailoring clusters in the hinterlands of India. 

Company Vision: Build iconic global fashion brands that make Indian craftsmanship relevant and alluring to the modern men and women everyday

Company Mission: Our ambitious mission at Rewanta is to preserve the handloom heritage & ensure sustainable livelihood for weavers by providing them fair wages, access to healthcare & improve general quality of life by reducing their migration to cities as unskilled labour. Generate enough work and more work so that the weaver is self-reliant & financially independent.
name: REWANTA FASHIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: GasTechno® converts stranded gas into valuable chemicals and fuels via a patented gas to liquids (GTL) process. The competitive advantage is Simple Hardware, Sophisticated Software®, tuning for different feedstock ranging from rich associated gas to lean biogas. The Mini-GTL® 300 commercial technology has been proven in Michigan, USA with its third-generation plant validated in 2016-2017 (right). GEFH is now taking this technology globally.
name: GasTechno Energy & Fuels (India) Private Limited

idea:
Ashish Vadgama - Founder has a very versatile experience ranging from creative at one end of spectrum whilst covering retail, education, IT/ ITES, pharma and services at the other end of the spectrum.

Administration, Project Coordination, Liasoning & Vendor Management.

PR, HR, Marketing/Branding & Learning & Development, .
Strategy, Automation, Business Analytics, Process Engineering & Change Management.

culminated in the founding of Beyond Infinity.
name: Beyond Infinity

idea: Techinvention Lifecare Pvt Ltd is Biotechnology company focused on capacity building to enable  access to novel prophylactics, therapeutics and diagnostics to the Developing World. With 'Make for the world' as its core in the arena of products/services it also endeavors to take Indian talent and technology to the developing world. The prime objective being making Novel Biotech based Prophylactics, Therapeutics and Diagnostics - Affordable, Acceptable and Accessible to the Developing World.
name: TECHINVENTION LIFECARE PRIVATE LIMITED
